name: idleon-injector-ui
description: A cheat injector for Legends of Idleon

scripts.build: npm run build:cheats && pkg . -t node18-win-x64 --compress Gzip --output InjectCheatsUI.exe
scripts.build-unix: npm run build:cheats && pkg . -t node18-linux-x64 --compress Gzip --output InjectCheatsUI-linux
scripts.build-macos-x64: npm run build:cheats && pkg . -t node18-macos-x64 --compress Gzip --output InjectCheatsUI-macos-x64
scripts.build-macos-arm64: npm run build:cheats && pkg . -t node18-macos-arm64 --compress Gzip --output InjectCheatsUI-macos-arm64

author: MrJoiny
